artefact.overview: Practise the official driving theory test from the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).
artefact.more_information:
Practice tests are free of charge.

You'll take a different practice test depending on whether you're learning to drive:

+ a car
+ a motorcycle
+ a lorry (large goods vehicle)
+ a bus or coach (passenger carrying vehicle)

Each test has 50 questions.

The tests are similar to the theory test you'll take at the test centre, except the real motorcycle, lorry, bus and coach tests have 100 questions.
artefact.introduction:
Practise the official driving theory test from the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
artefact.will_continue_on: the Safe Driving for Life website

artefact.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
